    "number": 158762,
    "data": "1,9,81,738,6642,59787,544644,4901805,44129367,401947281,3617545212,32572255824,296637113061,2669762715372,24041811608757,218918218136841,1970298831114945,17745398880920694,161561679852872034",
    "name": "Expansion of (1+9*x+80*x^2)/(1-x^2-729*x^3).",
    "comment": [
        "This can be generated by multiplying the sum of the elements in the top row of the n-th power of the matrix [(0,3,0), (0,0,3),(3,1/27,0)] by 3^n."
    ],
    "link": [
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (0,1,729)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n)=a(n-2)+729*a(n-3). [From R. J. Mathar, Mar 26 2009]"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Clear[M, v, t, n];",
        "M = {{0, t, 0}, {0, 0, t}, {t, 1/t^3, 0}};",
        "v[0] = {1, 1, 1};",
        "v[n_] := v[n] = M.v[n - 1];",
        "CharacteristicPolynomial[M, x];",
        "t = 3;",
        "a = Table[t^n*v[n][[1]], {n, 0, 30}]"
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 25 2009",
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 9,
    "time": "2015-06-13T00:53:11-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
